criteriaItems.value: Escalation support,Ongoing training,Relationship management,Upgrade CS Tier,Custom reporting,Post-sale concessions,Other
Pre-sale support,Escalation support,Ongoing training,Relationship management,Upgrade CS Tier,Custom reporting,Post-sale concessions,Other

rules.fullName: Calculate Days Failed for Finance Case
rules.formula: AND( IsClosed , ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Stripe"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Finance")))

rules.fullName: Copy Account Priority to Case Priority s0
rules.description: This copies the account's priority to the case default priority field for consistency. NOTE: SFDC only allows to select one picklist value per workflow.

rules.fullName: Copy Account Priority to Case Priority s1
rules.description: This copies the account's priority to the case default priority field for consistency. NOTE: SFDC only allows to select one picklist value per workflow.

rules.fullName: Copy Account Priority to Case Priority s2
rules.description: This copies the account's priority to the case default priority field for consistency. NOTE: SFDC only allows to select one picklist value per workflow.

rules.fullName: Copy Account Priority to Case Priority s3
rules.description: This copies the account's priority to the case default priority field for consistency. NOTE: SFDC only allows to select one picklist value per workflow.

rules.fullName: Copy Account Priority to Case Priority s4
rules.description: This copies the account's priority to the case default priority field for consistency. NOTE: SFDC only allows to select one picklist value per workflow.
When a new case with case reason "Feedback" is created, email it to Conflux for curation

rules.fullName: Express Returns-Alert Owner of New Case
Identify new cases that are Dashboard Feedback
rules.description: This workflow checks the field isDashboardFeedback when a Feedback case is submitted through dashboard.
This sends an email alert when an established SMB customer (>45 days old) gives us a low NPS score
This sends an email alert when a new SMB customer (< 30 days old) gives us a low NPS score
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'NPS'), Delighted_score__c <=6, Account.Segment__c == 'SMB', Account.Days_post_first_purchase__c <= 45, Account.Lifetime_Purchases__c < 6000)

rules.description: This sends an email alert when a new SMB customer (< 30 days old) gives us a low NPS score
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'NPS'), Delighted_score__c <=6, Account.Segment__c == 'SMB', Account.Days_post_first_purchase__c <= 45, Account.Lifetime_Purchases__c > 5999)

rules.description: This sends an email alert when a non-SMB customer gives us a low NPS score

rules.fullName: SMB Customer asked for a return
rules.description: This alert gets sent out when a customer submits a return
This workflow updates the fields First Response Date and HourstoFirstContact
Update the email of the CSM on a case if the case is associated with an account with a CSM owner
